sentence: George Kerr , the swift striding Jamaican , set a meet record in the 600 - yard run in the Knights of Columbus track meet tonight , beating Purdue 's Dave Mills in a hot duel in 1.10.1 .
Kerr , who set the world record earlier this month in New York with a clocking of 1.09.3 , wiped out Mills 's early pace and beat the young Big 10 quarter-mile king by 5 yards .
